fix: Improve Google Form parser and add detailed preview

Parser Improvements:
- Rewrite parser with better section boundary detection
- Improved question/option detection logic
- Better handling of multi-line Arabic text
- More robust section title matching
- Fix duplicate sections issue
- Better handling of long questions vs options
- Should now capture all 100 questions correctly

Import UI Fixes:
- Fix import button disabled state \(was checking selectedFile instead of preview\)
- Now works for both paste mode and JSON mode
- Button enables when preview is available

Preview Enhancements:
- Add "Show Detailed Preview" button
- Preview shows all questions with:
  * Question text \(first 150 chars\)
  * All options \(A, B, C, D\)
  * Correct answer marked with âœ“
- Scrollable preview \(max-height with overflow\)
- Collapsible to keep UI clean
- Shows section-by-section breakdown

Parsing Logic:
1. Find all section boundaries first
2. Parse each section independently
3. Detect questions by: Arabic text OR long lines OR question keywords
4. Collect 4 options per question
5. Skip questions with < 2 options
6. Handle "Ketentuan Ikhtibar" as introduction type
